name: Station 27
description:
As the sold responsible engineer assigned to Station 27, you only have two jobs. 

1. Bounce around your own space station to kill time. 

2. Bounce around space towards other stations so that you can take care of sweet, sweet maintenance jobs. 

Credit 

Arts - Ye Mon Aung (Icemojo)

Programmer - Zwe Wai Yan Htet

Music - Voice of Eternity by Keys of Moon Music
